title: New board support: the UP board
text: The UP board is x86-based with a Raspberry Pi compatible 40-pin connector, designed for 'professional makers' who need a reliable, high-performing device to build and grow their projects.

title: Case Study: Open ROV
text: Using resin.io on underwater remote controlled drones.

title: Spring IoT Hackathon Recap
text: This month we hosted our first hackathon in a long while at Campus London, with the theme of "Multi-Device Internet of Things".

title: Work with us!
text: We are actively recruiting for a Solution Architect, Rust Software Engineer, and other roles.
